name: Create a Brand Strategy with ChatGPT and Notion
description:
Develop a dynamic brand strategy with the help of ChatGPT’s AI analysis, integrated with Notion’s organizational tools. This setup enables you to map out and adjust your strategy with precision and ease.

Estimated number of ChatGPT tokens used by this template: 4,000 tokens for prompts and 1,000 tokens for a completion.

[What are tokens and how to count them?](https://help.openai.com/en/articles/4936856-what-are-tokens-and-how-to-count-them)
